info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.routers

Class RouterToReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.routers.RouterToReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageReceiver, Router

    public class RouterToReceiver
extends Object
implements Router
    Default implementation of router that uses TargetingStrategy to get a target for message and forward message to the corresponding receiver stored in internal table.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.routers.Router
